attributes.action: Stop non essential construction workers being forced to work during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of Coronavirus on travel and putting employees in positions where they are forced to work and put themselves and families health at risk and others!!
attributes.background: Construction workers on large sites building large developments, flats and commercial are expected to still travel into work, companies are exploiting the use of the word key workers! Ensure they are paid 80% of their salaries and can also stay home during this pandemic to stop the spread!
